 (:require [ring.util.response :as response]
 [compojure.core :refer :all]
 [emo-calorie.views.emo-calorie-layout :refer [common-layout]]
 [emo-calorie.models.query-defs :as query]
 [clojure.data.json :as json])
 (:import (java.time LocalDateTime)
 (java.text SimpleDateFormat)
 (java.util Date)))

(defn index-get [request]
 (common-layout
 [:p]))

(defn get-goal [request]
 (for [goal (query/get-goal-today)]
 (json/write-str goal)))

(defn post-goal [request]
 (let [goal (get-in request [:params :goal])]
 (query/clear-status!)
 (query/insert-goal-today<! {
 :goal (read-string goal)
 :sdate (.format (SimpleDateFormat. "MM/dd/yyyy") (Date.))
 :calories 0})))

(defroutes emo-calorie-routes
 (GET "/" [] index-get)
 (GET "/getgoal" [] get-goal)
 (POST "/goal" [] post-goal))
" "(get-goal [])" "(ns emo-calorie.routes.emo-calorie-routes
 (:require [ring.util.response :as response]
 [compojure.core :refer :all]
 [emo-calorie.views.emo-calorie-layout :refer [common-layout]]
 [emo-calorie.models.query-defs :as query]
 [clojure.data.json :as json])
 (:import (java.time LocalDateTime)
 (java.text SimpleDateFormat)
 (java.util Date)))

(defn index-get [request]
 (common-layout
 [:p]))

(defn get-goal [request]
 (for [goal (query/get-goal-today)]
 (json/write-str goal)))

(defn post-goal [request]
 (let [goal (get-in request [:params :goal])]
 (query/clear-status!)
 (query/clear-food!)
 (query/insert-goal-today<! {
 :goal (read-string goal)
 :sdate (.format (SimpleDateFormat. "MM/dd/yyyy") (Date.))
 :calories 0})))

(defn post-food [request]
 (let [name (get-in request [:params :name])
 calories (get-in request [:params :calories])
 current (get-in request [:params :current])]
 (query/insert-food-today<! {
 :name name
 :calories (read-string calories)})
 (query/update-calories {:calories (- (read-string calories) (read-string current))})))

(defroutes emo-calorie-routes
 (GET "/" [] index-get)
 (GET "/getgoal" [] get-goal)
 (POST "/goal" [] post-goal)
 (POST "/food" [] post-food))
" "(ns emo-calorie.routes.emo-calorie-routes
 (:require [ring.util.response :as response]
 [compojure.core :refer :all]
 [emo-calorie.views.emo-calorie-layout :refer [common-layout]]
 [emo-calorie.models.query-defs :as query]
 [clojure.data.json :as json])
 (:import (java.time LocalDateTime)
 (java.text SimpleDateFormat)
 (java.util Date)))

(defn index-get [request]
 (common-layout
 [:p]))

(defn get-goal [request]
 (for [goal (query/get-goal-today)]
 (json/write-str goal)))

(defn post-goal [request]
 (let [goal (get-in request [:params :goal])]
 (query/clear-status!)
 (query/clear-food!)
 (query/insert-goal-today<! {
 :goal (read-string goal)
 :sdate (.format (SimpleDateFormat. "MM/dd/yyyy") (Date.))
 :calories 0})))

(defn post-food [request]
 (let [name (get-in request [:params :name])
 calories (get-in request [:params :calories])
 current (get-in request [:params :current])]
 (query/insert-food-today<! {
 :name name
 :calories (read-string calories)})
 (query/update-calories! {:calories (+ (read-string current) (read-string calories))})))

(defroutes emo-calorie-routes
 (GET "/" [] index-get)
 (GET "/getgoal" [] get-goal)
 (POST "/goal" [] post-goal)
 (POST "/food" [] post-food))
" "(query/update-calories! {:calories (+ (read-string "1300") (read-string "300"))})" "(ns emo-calorie.routes.emo-calorie-routes
 (:require [ring.util.response :as response]
 [compojure.core :refer :all]
 [emo-calorie.views.emo-calorie-layout :refer [common-layout]]
 [emo-calorie.models.query-defs :as query]
 [clojure.data.json :as json])
 (:import (java.time LocalDateTime)
 (java.text SimpleDateFormat)
 (java.util Date)))

(defn index-get [request]
 (common-layout
 [:p]))

(defn get-goal [request]
 (for [goal (query/get-goal-today)]
 (json/write-str goal)))

(defn post-goal [request]
 (let [goal (get-in request [:params :goal])]
 (query/clear-status!)
 (query/clear-food!)
 (query/insert-goal-today<! {
 :goal (read-string goal)
 :sdate (.format (SimpleDateFormat. "MM/dd/yyyy") (Date.))
 :calories 0})))

(defn post-food [request]
 (let [name (get-in request [:params :name])
 calories (get-in request [:params :calories])
 current (get-in request [:params :current])]
 (query/insert-food-today<! {
 :name name
 :calories (read-string calories)})
 (str "" (query/update-calories! {:calories (+ (read-string current) (read-string calories))})) ))

(defroutes emo-calorie-routes
 (GET "/" [] index-get)
 (GET "/getgoal" [] get-goal)
 (POST "/goal" [] post-goal)
 (POST "/food" [] post-food))
